snippet: The world governing body for track and field said several track athletes who competed at the 2005 world championships had tested positive for doping after the retesting of their samples.
lead_paragraph: The world governing body for track and field said several track athletes who competed at the 2005 world championships had tested positive for doping after the retesting of their samples.

headline.seo: Positive Tests for Doping Among Track Athletes
headline.main: 8 Years Later, Positive Tests for Doping
